: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus' optics narrow at the sight of his nemesis.

Rodimus Prime: It's not my fault that the Decepticons were all warlords. If the Predacons don't like being oppressed, they should blame their ancestors. The Pax Cybertronia was signed for a reason. Now as for Nightlight, you wont kill her. If you do, you'll lose your hold on me. And you are wrong. I'm not acting like a Predacon, but your damn right when you say I'm ruthless. You'll see just how ruthless I can be!


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
OOC: add this to my last one

Hydras:

"Plus old friend"hissed ironical Hydras"I'm very thankful, I need to 
know a things and you gave me the answer... Do you know something, 
old pal????? I personally think that your affirmation about other 
spy in my ranks it's a big lie.... if existed one you never had 
mentioned it but I swear you if I see anything suspicius around her, 
I personally will kill her!!!... try to do anything and you will see 
what happen... "
